message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $12,000 is significantly lower than what I had in mind.  How about we meet halfway between our previous offers at $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product. Can you consider that?
